Title: Long live the victory of Chairman Mao's revolutionary line in art!
Publisher: Shanghai Agitation Literature Society Revolutionary Rebellion Committee (上海点火文学社革命造反委员会), Chinese Academy of Sciences East China Branch Revolutionary Rebellion Committee (中国科学院华东分院革命造反委员会)
Notes: The book shown is an edition of Mao's 1942 "Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art" (在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话, Zai Yan'an Wen Yì Zuotanhui shang de Jianghua). The figures below are from model works such as The Red Lantern and the White-Haired Girl.
Tags: Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art
在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话
The Legend of the Red Lantern
